name: mikwewa-free
title: MikWewa Maps Bundle
description: This module provides the free map pack by mapmakers Mik & Wewa. You will find 20 distinctive hand-drawn maps spanning two themes; 10 battlemaps to challenge your players and 10 shops to entertain them when they return to town. All maps are pre-configured with walls and lighting sources and ready to play. Enjoy your adventuring and have fun!
author: Mik and Wewa
